abstract: Standard & Poor’s said it will add Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway to its flagship S&P 500 stock index, as the company prepares to acquire railroad operator Burlington Northern Santa Fe.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s said it will add Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway to its flagship S&P 500 stock index, as the company prepares to acquire railroad operator Burlington Northern Santa Fe.
lead_paragraph: Standard & Poor’s said it would add Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway to its flagship S&P 500 stock index, as the company prepares to acquire a company already on the list, the railroad operator Burlington Northern Santa Fe.

headline.main: Berkshire to Join S.&P. 500, and Its Shares Soar
